column4: ive also had pretty bad battery life, and idle life. i dual boot win 7 and have never had the issue there
Have you checked for error messages in /var/log/Xorg.0.log or from "dmesg"?
no i have not. i am still learning. what is that exactly
/var/log/Xorg.0.log is a log file specific to X.org, which is the base of your GUI. "dmesg" prints messages from the kernel.
